attributes.action: Should future Scottish Independence referendum be to leave Uk another held
attributes.additional_details: Due to the SNPs desired intent to call another referendum at some stage in the future and ignore the previous referendums result and the democratic will of the people of Scotland, it is the democratic will of the Scottish people that another referendum be held within 1 year to confirm the result as firm fair and final and that no change of heart has occurred by the people of Scotland.
attributes.background: Should the SNP call another referendum and its result be to leave UK the will of the Scottish people will be to hold another to confirm the result in case of change of heart or circumstances
